{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Green chaos serpent big meat chunk | class = Demon1Chunk4 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]]→Demon1Chunk4
One of the five chunks of meat thrown around when a [[Classes:Demon1|green chaos serpent]] is gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon1Chunk4 : [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]] { States { Spawn: DEMD A 4 DEMD A 10 [[A_QueueCorpse]] DEMD A 20 Wait Death: DEMD A -1 Stop } }
